messages.message:
Hi team, I'm running into some issues when adding a new python module dependency. In the below PR, I add a py util `compression-utils`  which makes use a of a new python module `zstd` . I added `zstd`  to each relevant service's `requirements.in (http://requirements.in)` and regenerated its `requirements.txt` but for some reason the build is still failing with `ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'zstd'`

is there a step that I missed? thank you!
PR: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/29851
You can try to diagnose what may be going on by connecting to the container and manually checking what may be happening as you would on your local machine
